instantServices.title: PUC Certificate Service
instantServices.description: Government-approved Pollution Under Control (PUC) certificate issuance at your doorstep with certified technicians and equipment.
instantServices.shortDescription: Get PUC certificate at your doorstep

process.title: Book Appointment
process.description: Select date, time, and location online

process.title: Technician Visit
process.description: Certified technician comes to your location

requirements: Vehicle should be in running condition

faqs.question: How long is the PUC certificate valid?
faqs.answer: PUC certificate is valid for 6 months from the date of issue.

faqs.question: What if my vehicle fails the test?
faqs.answer: If your vehicle fails, we'll provide a detailed report. You'll need to get repairs done and schedule a re-test.
